designScenario.name: Advanced Cabin Cooler System
designScenario.description: The Advanced Cabin Cooler System is a next-generation environmental control subsystem designed to maintain optimal cabin temperature under extreme external conditions. It employs a variable-speed refrigeration cycle with eco-friendly refrigerants, adaptive airflow management, and predictive thermal load balancing. The system integrates smart sensors, hybrid heat exchangers, and redundant power pathways to ensure rapid cooling response, energy efficiency, and fault tolerance. It supports dynamic adjustments based on cabin occupancy, altitude variations, and external climate data while maintaining compatibility with modern aircraft power architectures.

details.description: The cooler shall dynamically adjust cooling output based on real-time cabin occupancy data, external temperature, and altitude-derived pressure changes.
The system shall maintain a coefficient of performance (COP) ≥ 3.5 across all operational altitudes between sea level and 45,000 ft.
Dual independent cooling circuits with N+2 redundancy shall maintain minimum cooling capacity during single or dual component failures.
Operational noise shall not exceed 65 dB(A) at passenger ear level during maximum cooling load conditions.

systemComponents.name: Smart Cooling Unit
systemComponents.description: Primary cooling assembly combining refrigeration cycle components with intelligent flow control and predictive load management

subComponents.name: Variable-Speed Magnetic Compressor
subComponents.description: Oil-free compressor with wide modulation range (10-100% capacity) for precise cooling output control

subComponents.name: Hybrid Microchannel Heat Exchanger
subComponents.description: Combined condenser/evaporator unit with phase-change material integration for thermal inertia mitigation

subComponents.name: Smart Refrigerant Flow Regulator
subComponents.description: Electro-mechanical valve array with predictive mass flow adjustment based on cabin thermal dynamics

subComponents.name: Multi-Zone Air Ducting
subComponents.description: Pressure-optimized airflow distribution network with individually controllable venturis for cabin sectors

systemComponents.name: Thermal Sensing Array
systemComponents.description: Distributed network of hyperspectral thermal sensors with 3D cabin temperature mapping capability

subComponents.name: Multi-Point IR Sensors
subComponents.description: Infrared sensor clusters measuring surface temperatures of cabin fixtures and passenger heat signatures

subComponents.name: Airflow Velocity Probes
subComponents.description: Pitot-static tubes with temperature compensation for real-time convection pattern analysis

systemComponents.name: Cooling Management Unit
systemComponents.description: Dual-channel FADEC (Full Authority Digital Environmental Control) system with machine learning-based thermal optimization

subComponents.name: Predictive Load Calculator
subComponents.description: Neural network module forecasting cooling demands based on flight phase and passenger load

subComponents.name: Redundant Control Processors
subComponents.description: Triple modular redundant computing nodes for fault-tolerant operation

relationships.description: The cooler system operates as a primary thermal management component within the aircraft's comprehensive environmental control architecture
Cooling performance depends on coordinated operation with the aircraft's pneumatic air distribution infrastructure
Bidirectional data exchange with FMS for altitude/route-based cooling strategy optimization
Compressor module designed for hot-swap replacement without full system shutdown

attributes.name: coolingCapacity
attributes.description: Peak heat removal capacity at sea level standard conditions

attributes.name: operatingTemperatureRange
attributes.description: Effective cabin temperature regulation range relative to external ambient conditions

attributes.name: responseTime
attributes.description: Maximum delay between temperature threshold breach and cooling initiation

attributes.name: thermalMappingResolution
attributes.description: Spatial temperature measurement accuracy across cabin volume

attributes.name: energyEfficiencyRatio
attributes.description: Minimum coefficient of performance at maximum continuous operation

attributes.name: acousticOutput
attributes.description: Peak noise emission level at passenger locations during operation

attributes.name: redundancyLevel
attributes.description: Failure tolerance level for critical cooling components

requirements.name: AdaptiveCoolingControl
requirements.text: Shall dynamically adjust cooling output based on cabin occupancy, external temp, and altitude

comments.body: Next-gen environmental control system with predictive thermal management and N+2 redundancy
Triple modular redundant processors with voting system
